entry.title: bitcoin.org SOPA/PIPA blackout
entry.summary: The issue of censorship on Wikipedia has sparked controversy, with some arguing that the platform should not become a political organization. However, the argument is not about left or right politics, but rather about the fundamental principles of free speech and democracy. Gregory, an expert in the field, has shown how censorship directly impacts Bitcoin. This highlights the importance of protecting free speech in all areas of society, including online platforms.
